string.original: Excellent work, you've found Alastair! You must speak with him. He will test your body and mind. Complete his tasks and prove your worth to become the true ruler!
Use COINS and EXPLORE here to see who this is.
Edible tuber used in Cooking recipes.
Delicious fruit used in Cooking recipes.
So lifelike! Who could made a perfect replica? Explore to investigate!
Is anyone home? Expand to find out!
Where you craft all your food.
Where you craft all your magical spells and potions.
Adds new craftables for your workshop.
A well to help water your people.
A small bridge made of wood.
There is evidence that someone lives underneath. If you dare, expand here to meet them!
A long wall made of stone.
A dragon cut from a bush.
I wonder if it breathes fire?
A heroic Knight Frozen in time!
A princess frozen by a magic spell.
Expand here and give her a kiss to find out what happens?
Some very valuable Dragon Horns! Expand here to find out what can be crafted from them!
Dragons are real? Expand here to look for more!
A place for the kingdom's guards to rest.
Keep quiet, people are trying to look smart here.
Crafting item used to help cook other items.
Recipe used to make other crafts.
Used to make bread and crusts in the Kitchen.
Used in making cakes and muffins.
Grape Jam to spread on toast.
Crafting recipe used in other crafts.
Crafting item used to craft other items
Axe Heads are used to create different types of weapons.
A Woodsman's Axe that will make you chop wood at an incredible speed
A Hammer that will make you build at an incredible speed
This comes from chopping a Pine Tree.
Where might it lead? Expand to find out!
Explore here to find out what's inside!
Helps you gather wood and cut trees.
Processes basic materials for your kichen.
Adds yummy pasteries to your kitchen.
Lets you process animals for your kitchen.
Adds weapons and armor to your workshop.
Cereal grain used in Cooking recipes.
Special beans used in Cooking recipes.
Lets you craft art and decos.
Special feed that will make an animal mature instantly.
Recipe used to make other crafts.
This comes from harvesting Magic Beans.
This comes from feeding a Peacock.
Chop trees in a single swing.
This can be found by mining rocks.
Crafting item used to make new items
Recipe used to make other crafts.
Blue Dye is used to craft items in the Studio.
Special paper used for other crafts.
Recipe used to make other crafts.
Crafting item used to make other items.
Visit The Duke to trade for this item
A Magic Wand will make you craft at an incredible speed
A Ruby Scepter will make you craft at an incredible speed
Boom Powder is used to blow things up.
Make you look like a wizard.
Wool Thread used to craft other items
Cotton Thread used to make other crafts.
Crafting Item used to make other items
Crafting item used to craft other items.
Crafting items used to make other items
Used to make items in the Studio.
A Hand Drill will make you craft at an incredible speed
A Sprinkler will make your crops grow at an incredible speed
This comes from harvesting Chili Peppers.
Adds tapesteries and clothes to your studio.
Where you start a Mardi Gras Parade.
Allows you to store your goods.
Wizards are not architects, this is the result.
Crafting item used to make other items.
Bottles are used in making other crafts.
Use an oven to cook and forge.
Crafting item used to craft other items.
Crafting item used to craft other items
Used to help craft in the Workshop.
Where you craft all your manufacturing needs.
A plot of land where you plant crops.
Is your kingdom sophisticated enough for an Opera House?
Allows you to trade items with neighbors.
Moonbeams and Angel Wings, all viewable from here.
Leafy vegetable used in Cooking recipes.
A place so rough it ONLY has basic cable.
A Bungalow produces 10 gold coins from taxes.
A Cottage produces 50 gold coins from taxes.
A Farmhouse produces 80 gold coins from taxes.
A Chateau produces 250 gold coins from taxes.
A Manor produces 400 gold coins from taxes.
This comes from chopping down an Oak Tree.
This comes from chopping down a Pine Tree.
This coming from chopping down a Willow Tree.
This comes from chopping down a Birch Tree.
A delicious pie ready for dinner.
Crafting Item used to make other items.
Crafting item used to make other items
Crafting Item that is used to crafter other items
Crafting item that makes other items
Crafting item to make other items
Crafting item used to make other items.
Crafting Recipe used in other crafts.
Crafting item used to craft other items
Crafting item used to make other items
Recipe used to make other crafts.
A statue dedicated to your knight.
Expand here and use this catapult to help protect your kingdom!
Crafting item that makes other items.
Wooden Wall to keep beasties out.
Rubble Wall to keep beasties out.
Look inside maybe someone left some treasure!
A Moat to protect the Castle.
Expand here for a cannon! Guaranteed to blow something to smithereens!!
Treasure Chest with a gem inside
I suppose this party is for those with a big nose.
Explore here to find out what's inside!
The perfect place to raise the roof in your kingdom!
Turkey legs and mutton joints abound at the feast!
MMMM Smells good I wonder whats cooking?
Bedding is used to craft beds.
This is created in teh studio.
Cattails can only be placed on water.
Expand here and give him a kiss to find out what happens?
Where the king or queen takes care of business.
Helps you protect your town from beasties.
Helps you gather wood and cut trees.
A large statue dedicated to George.
A large statue dedicated to the Queen.
Crafting item used to craft other items
A Fearsome Dragon blocks entrance to the Crystal Cave.
Beastie Nearby! Do you want to mine for {energy} energy?
The sign of a true ruler
This is the egg Ember the Dragon was searching for.
Explore here to find out what's inside!
A bottle of oil used in cooking and other crafting recipes
A Bowl of Tomato Bisque Soup
A cake based used to make other cakes.
Decadent chocolate covered strawberries. Restores 5 Energy
A pizza fresh from the oven.
Great for smashing Beasties or playing some golf
Protect your horse's feet from wear and tear
Gains double tax on the next 5 tax buildings
Builder's Level, necessary to build the Clockmaker
A Bottle of Ink used to make documents
A Loom used to build a Tailor Workshop
A Piece of Parchment for you to write things on.
Swipe over ITEMS to collect them
Hello, I’m The Duke, I will help guide you to becoming King or Queen!
Take a moment to survey your lands!
Those people are part of a search party, looking for the Wizard Alastair.
Excellent, you have enough COINS. Let's EXPLORE!
That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! He must be nearby! Check the SATCHEL for clues.
Use Coins to explore and expand yer Kingdom.
Collect more Coins from Castle Buildings, Shanty Houses or by selling items to explore more!
Click on a Gloomy Area to explore
Increasing your Kingdom's Happiness unlocks new Castle Buildings that raise your Castle Level. Then you can explore to find Wizard Alastair!
You've found an XP STAR! These special stars increase your LEVEL, shown in the blue XP METER above. Perform actions to earn more!
Marvelous! The GLOOM WOLF dropped one of SONJA'S ARROWHEADS. I wager she'd be HAPPY to have it back.
Click to give GIFTS to characters
Giving GIFTS to people makes them HAPPY. HAPPINESS allows you to expand your CASTLE!
Am I glad to see you! While looking for ALASTAIR, I found NATHANIEL. He was fighting GLOOM WOLVES and dropped his fine Axe. Please return it to him.
Thanks! I would have banished those Gloom Wolves myself if I hadn't lost my arrowhead. Have you seen it?
Giving Gifts to your Kingdom's residents also increases Happiness. Beloved rulers check back frequently to keep their people happy.
Click Sonja to give her arrowhead
If you built a Bazaar, you could trade items with your neighbors!
Now that you've purchased the Bazaar, you'll need to build it.
A happy kingdom needs a thriving economy. You can earn gold by building houses and collecting taxes from them.
The more houses you have, the more taxes you can collect to fund your kingdom’s growth! Cha-Ching!
Buy a Bungalow from the Market, build it, and click to collect taxes
No farm would be complete without a Chicken!
As your Kingdom grows, you'll be able to care for different animals, like Cows and Sheep!
Animals and other items can be bought in the Market.
Growing and selling crops is another way to earn money! Lets start with grapes.
Crops like grapes can be sold for Coins, given as Gifts, or used to craft other useful items.
Click on the Empty Farm Plot to buy and plant 1 Grape crop
The more farm plots you have, the more CROPS your subjects can enjoy. Empty plots may be purchased from the BUILDING tab in the Market.
As your Kingdom grows, we will need more Crops. Buy 2 Empty Farm Plots from the Market so we can plant more.
Crops take some time to grow, but they're worth it!
Buy Empty Farm Plots from the Buildings section of the Market.
Crops planted near WATER grow faster because they're irrigated! Move your Empty FARM Plots near the POND and harvest some Wheat.
Crops that are grown near water will grow faster.
Irrigated Wheat always tastes better, don't you agree?
Move the Farm Plots near the pond and harvest your Wheat.
We should fortify this castle with some walls and towers!
This place is really starting to come together!
Purchase walls and a tower from your Great Hall
SWIPE your mouse over ITEMS to COLLECT them
Swipe your mouse over items to collect them
Mmm! Those are some tasty grapes.
Look at that loot! Point your mouse at items to collect them. You might need them later.
Sonja has given you a special task called a QUEST. Complete QUESTS to earn rewards and make your people HAPPY.
You can use these tools to Move and Rotate my target.
Click the tool and then the target to Move or Rotate it.
You have collected enough blue XP STARS to gain a level! Each level unlocks new items in the MARKET and increases your ENERGY. Claim your new LEVEL now!
Level Up to regain ENERGY and unlock items in the MARKET
CLICK your AVATAR to LEVEL UP
Look at SONJA. The exclamation mark means that she needs something. Can you help her by completing her QUEST?
Click your Avatar to level up!
Leveling up gives you Energy and unlocks new items in the Market.
Click your Avatar to level up
Mmm! Those are some tasty grapes.
Mmm! Those are some tasty grapes.
CLICK on SONJA to give her a GIFT.
Giving Gifts to people makes them HAPPY. HAPPINESS helps your kingdom to GROW!
Thank you, Highness! Take this axe. My friend Nathaniel dropped it while fighting off those blasted Gloom Wolves.
For this quest, let's build a BUNGALOW from the MARKET.
Your Majesty, there can be little Happiness where Gloom Wolves lurk. Please banish any that you encounter!
Huzzah! With the Gloom Wolves gone, your Kingdom is happier. You are a valiant banisher of beasties!
Click on the Gloom Wolves to banish them.
Place the House foundation on the ground
Click the ICON to view the QUEST
Click on ROCKS to mine STONE
Click on TREES to chop WOOD LOGs
Click the ICON to complete the QUEST
A magnificent Great Hall! Now you may name your KINGDOM!
CLICK the GROUND and DRAG to look around
Scrolling allows you to look around
Click the ground and drag to look around
This area became overgrown while it was under the Gloom. Can you help us reclaim it by clearin' Grass and placin' Wooden Fences?
Aye, that's better. We'll tame this wilderness yet!
Click on Grass and Brambles to clear em'.
A Lumber Camp will help ye gather Wood to build more buildings.
Gatherin' Buildings like this Lumber Camp collect resources while ye relax... or clear some brambles. Yer choice.
Buy 1 Lumber Camp from the Market and build it
It looks like Nathaniel could use some help. See what QUESTS he has to offer.
When your Grapes are ready, click to harvest them.
Click on 2 Grapes to harvest them.
Place the Great Hall from Your Inventory
Castles are unlocked by happiness. Here, we were saving this one fer ye upon yer return.
Odin's beard! That's a mighty Great Hall. Ye can click on it to buy more Castle Buildings!
Find 1 Great Hall in your Inventory and build it.
Tax the Shanty House to collect Coins
COINS allow you to buy items and buildings to keep your residents HAPPY and grow your KINGDOM. Collect TAXES from HOUSES to earn COINS.
Click Sonja's House to complete it.
CLICK Sonja's House to build it
Tax the Bungalow to collect Coins
COINS allow you to buy items and buildings to keep your residents HAPPY and grow your KINGDOM. Collect TAXES from HOUSES to earn COINS.
Gather Rocks and Wood to complete Sonja's House.
Now you have enough resources to build.
Mine Rocks for Stone and chop Trees for Wood
Nathaniel would really love a Woodsman's Axe
This Woodsman's Axe will make chopping trees a snap!
The blasted Gloom scared off all of our farm animals. Would ye purchase us some new ones?
Thank ye, Majesty! Farm animals produce resources that we can give as gifts or use in craftin'.
Animals can be purchased in the Market.
Find 1 Great Hall in your Inventory
I've given you your first Castle Building, the Great Hall! Find it in your Inventory and build it.
You have built a magnificent Great Hall, Majesty!
Find 1 Great Hall in your Inventory and build it
A handful of wet oats used to be enough on the march, but no longer.
Buy Wheat seeds; craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Hot Buns
The name's Tom. I've been searching the Gloom for a nice place to settle.
This looks like a good place to settle.
Castle components are in the Market
Aye, I may be willing to give this kingdom a goo.
This could be the nicest place I've ever lived. *sniff*
Get logs from trees and stone from rock piles
Thieves have stolen my Tabard and I want it back!
Very pleased, my Laird, to have my Tabard back and bash those thieves.
I need weapons and equipment to train new knights.
I can now make men out of these boys.
Get Swords by crafting, trading or asking neighbors.
These lads are ready to show their metal mettle *wink*.
Banish Beasties wherever you find them
A hardboiled egg was real luxury in my campaigning days.
Ooh! A Pot Pie is a feast in one dish.
Tend Chickens to get Eggs and craft Chicken Pot Pie in the Kitchen.
I developed a taste for spicy foods in me travels.
Ha, ha! These Sausages remind me of golden-haired girls and fine beer!
Craft, Trade, or ask neighbors for 10 Spicy Sausages.
A Helmet for a Pillow? Nae!
There will be more comforts for me noo.
I can rest my weary bones, thank yea forsooth.
Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Cotton Cloth and Bedding
A little industry around here would make life easier for all.
This kingdom's as busy as a one-armed wallpaper hanger!
Purchase Gathering Buildings from the Market; harvest them to gain resources.
The forest will provide you with the resources we need to construct buildings. Gather wood logs and stone.
Take only what you need and the forest will always be with you.
Now you have enough resources to build.
Mine Rocks for Stone and chop Trees for Wood
Click in the Gloom to explore
Click on Gloom Wolves to banish them
We are under attack! Bash those beasties!
Bye bye, beasties! Good job, your majesty!
Click on the Gloom Wolves to banish them.
Purchase the Mining Camp in the Market
Click on the Mining Camp to collect stone
Gathering stone takes a lot of energy. A mining camp can do a lot of the work for you. Go ahead and build one.
Collecting stone will take much less of your energy now..
Build a mining camp and collect stone from it.
Rid the kingdom of Gloom Wolves
Click on Gloom Wolves to banish them
The beasties in your kingdom make the people unhappy. Clear the kingdom of beasties so that the people can be happy again.
Hooray! Now the people can be very happy! You are doing so well!
Click the Gloom Wolves to banish them.
Click on Gloom Wolves to banish them
Oh no! Those beasties are back, and they brought a friend. Bash them back to the Gloom!
Click on the Gloom Wolves to banish them.
Purchase energy items from the market
Bashing beasties can take a lot of energy. Luckily, you can store up energy items for use when beasties attack.
Now you'll be ready the next time beasties attack.
Purchase the Guardpost in the Great Hall
There are a lot of beasties around here. You should build a Guardpost to help defend against them.
Those beasties will think twice before they come here again.
Purchase a Guardpost from the Great Hall.
Click in the Gloom to explore
Have you noticed the beasties always come from the gloom? Maybe we can find more beasties by exploring the gloom.
The gloom is full of beasties! That is a good thing to know.
Click in the gloom to explore.
Castle walls can be purchased in the Great Hall
If we built some strong castle walls they might keep the beasties out.
You're doing well! Those are some good walls you built there.
Castle walls can be purchased from the Great Hall.
Reach out, your Majesty. To paraphrase the poet, no kingdom is an island, entire of itself.
Strengthen the ties of friendship, your Majesty. They may be very useful in the time ahead.
Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market
Your kingdom is not a workhouse. Soften the edges and the people will be elated.
Yes, much more livable and likable. Your subjects will be happier and more attached.
Click on Characters to give them Gifts
Give Gifts and Complete quests for Characters to raise Happiness
Reward subjects worthy of attention and those who are not as strong, but truly trying.
Those were nice touches, your Majesty. They may write songs about you yet.
Buy in the Building tab of the Market
Learn to specialize and trade for the specialites of others. Self-sufficiency is a fool's objective.
See how trade strengthens the bonds between kingdoms. It should be a strength of yours.
Click the Great Hall to buy Castle Pieces
Click Castle Buildings to Tax them
Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level
Raise up the Castle. It is a symbol, not doubt, but may be your bulwark someday.
A noble Castle helps the ruler appear more noble, as well, to all.
An exceptional ruler listens to the people and helps them for the good of all.
Very compassionate, your Majesty. The people recognize a ruler who is true.
Buy 5 Water tiles in the Nature tab of the Market
Buy in the Nature tab of the Market
A true ruler is like a river: powerful and constant, yet capable of sustaining life.
Like the plants and animals depend on the river for life, so do your subjects depend on you.
Buy in the Animals tab of the Market
The creatures driven off can prosper here once more. Give them that opportunity.
The people will be much more rooted and content with animals back.
Buy in the Building tab of the Market
Give the people homes they can take as their own and they will do well.
Those are fine homes. Most have never seen the like.
Click on Farm Plots to Plant new Crops
Click on Farm Plots to Plant new Crops
Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level
The land can provide more than simple sustenance. Demonstrate what it can do.
Spice and fiber for cloth. You are opening the eyes of the people to what might be.
Raise your Castle Level to Explore
Expand, your Majesty. Regain what is rightfully yours. You are a force for good.
Enemies are becoming aware of you. Taking back what is yours will not get easier.
Click Gloom Rats to Banish them
These vermin are pests and make the people unhappy. You must Banish them.
Be sure of it, there will be more of these Beasties. Prepare to deal with these plagues.
Click Gloom Wolves to Banish them
The stakes are raised, but you are ready, are you not?
You made short work of those dark howlers. Your people take pride in that.
Your neighbors will value you more when you lessen their burdens
Neighbors will be strongly inclined to return a good deed.
Rescue one Person from the Gloom
Explore new areas to find Characters to rescue
Real task is accept 1 new quest
Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level
There are good people lost in the GLOOM. Seek them and save them.
Those you have saved will not forget.
A true ruler must be as strong and sturdy as the walls of the castle. You have much work to do.
A good start. It will take great strength to push back the Gloom. More work must be done.
This is a different time. Leaders must earn their rank. Gathering Stone is an apt demonstration.
Much Stone will be needed in the future as well, but the people have seen you don't shirk.
Being adaptable will be useful. Be prepared to rearrange the kingdom as needed.
That looks better. The people can appreaciate a ruler with a plan.
Purchase new Buildings in the Building tab of the Market
There is no rest, your Majesty. There is more work to do and new residents will need shelter.
You build quickly, yet sturdily. The people will respect that.
Craft Clubs in the Workshop or Trade with friends
Buy Archery Targets in the Docrations tab of the Market
Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level
There is conflct ahead. Bare knuckles won't do. Begin gathering weapons.
These are very simple weapons, but they will serve for now. You will need better ere long.
Buy in the Building tab of the Market
Buy in the Building tab of the Market
Buy in the Building tab of the Market
There are also useful things to be found underground. Open the earth to see.
The mines and waters here are rich with resources. They are yours for the taking, if you are careful.
Artisans and craftsmen are drawn here by the opportunity. Set them loose.
The kingdom hums with energy. Work is being done.
Craft Items to increase Crafting Level
Craft Items at a Workshop, Kitchen or Studio
Think again of trade, your Majesty. You craftsmen should specialize to enhance the value of trade.
An excellent choice of skill. But be flexible. Something else may work better in the future.
Click the Great Hall to buy Castle Pieces
Click Houses and Castle Buildings to Tax them
Tax Houses and Castle Buildings for Coins
Most believe coins make the world go round. I know better, but that's another story.
The best things in life may indeed be free, but a healthy balance of coins is a comfort.
Click the Great Hall to buy Castle Pieces
Click the Great Hall to buy Castle Pieces
Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level
You are close to completing this challenge, your Majesty. A few touches to the Castle, perhaps.
You have proved worth, your Majesty. The kingdom is truly yours. I see great things for you.
Click dead trees to clear them
Hearts of Oak! Let’s clear Gloom damage to make room for new forest growth.
What the Gloom did to this forest is a crime. But it will be healthy and strong again, I swear.
Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom
Freeing another area of Gloom saves more trees from its poison.
Pine and dandy. We can restore this area now.
Buy Oaks in the Market, Nature Category
Buy Pines Trees in the Market, Nature Category
Hearts of oak! Now the replanting begins.
Wonderful! Soon enough those trees will be tall and strong.
Click on neighbors to visit them.
The Far Side of the Hill
I’d like to see how nearby forests are being managed. Let’s go visiting.
Hickory, chicory! The fight against the Gloom is spreading.
Move Farm Plots near water to make them Irrigated
Healthier crops will help the land overall.
Tree-rific! Better crops mean better water and better trees!
Click on trees to chop and gather Wood
Take care of the forest and it will provide for us.
A mighty tree, a sharpened axe, a pile of lumber laid in stacks.
Buy Super Chop from the Market, Consumables Category
Use Super Chop from the Inventory, Consumables Category
Quaking aspens! Make it a rule to use the right tool.
See! The man with the axe is also a king (of diamonds). What a card!
Craft a Iron Axe at a Workshop
Craft, Trade, or Ask Friends for Iron Axes
I've got Axes to grind, but new ones would be a better choice.
Sweet gum! These new Axes are cutting edge!
Buy Willows in the Market, Nature Category
Buy Birch Trees in the Market, Nature Category
Replenish the forest now so there is more wood later.
Planting trees is investing in mother nature's bank. Good work!
Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom
What else is out there? Friend or foe? If we don't push on we'll never know.
Free the forest, make more room, lower the boom on the nasty Gloom.
Click on a Gloom Beastie to Banish him.
These Beasties are a plague! Drive them out, I say!
Tis a fatal err to cross his path, comes the sharpened end of the hunter's wrath.
Craft a Club at a Workshop
Craft, Trade, or Ask Friends for Clubs
Beasties in the land? They won't stand, when they see us coming with a swinging club in hand.
Banish any Gloom Rats that spawn from Harvesting
Did you hear about the Rat that walked into a Club? Heh!
Gather Rat tails from Banishing Gloom Rats
Keep up the campaign and make the Rats feel the pain.
A banished Rat's Tail, a smelly dead snail, both are destined for the garbage pail.
Craft Light Breakfasts at the Kitchen
Craft, trade, or ask friends for Light Breakfasts
To get an early start a good breakfast plays its part.
Give me toasted bread and a well-cooked egg, and we'll get'er done or call me Meg.
Craft, trade, or ask friends for Spears
A little song, a little dance, a sharpened Spear in the pants.
Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom
Keep pushing the Gloom and see what we flush out.
Well look what’s here; glad we brought a Spear.
Animals will periodically be hunger, click animals with an arrow above them
Banish Gloom Wolves that show up when tending Animals
Let's put those Spears to good use.
We've got the Spears, the Wolves have their fears.
Animals will periodically be hunger, click animals with an arrow above them
Gather Wolf Hair from Banishing Gloom Wolves
Weird Wolves are still around, so let's run them to ground.
Not long ago it was the fir flying; now it’s the fur.
Get Pails of Water by Fishing
Craft, trade, or ask friends for Vegetable Juice
Let's take a break, our thirst to slake.
Needs some wind in your sail? Get some water in your pail.
Buy torches from the Decoration section of the Market.
I heard something moving near my house last night, but I'm not scared! I might be able to find out what it is if you place torches near my house.
It came back last night! I couldn't tell what it was, it avoided the light.
I heard a bird chirping all last night. I'll need some bags of Birdseed to keep it quiet.
All of the Birdseed was gone. This must be one big bird! I will investigate more.
Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Oat crops you need.
Grow Flax from Farm Plots or Trade neighbors for Flax.
I heard some loud banging late last night! I’d like to feed it different things to figure out what it is. I'd like to try Oats and Flax.
This thing has a big appetite. All of the Oats and Flax were gone this morning!
Craft Wooden Handles at the Workshop.
Harvest the Cotton from farms or Trade Neighbors for it.
Craft Oil at the Kitchen or Trade Neighbors for it.
It's time I go out and search for this creature. I need some materials for hand torches.
I followed the creature for a time, but he got away. It's legs were much much longer than mine.
Get Honey from clearing flowers. Plant more from the Market, if you run out.
Get Berries from clearing grasses. Plant more from the Market, if you run out.
This creature is fast. I'll try to attract it with some natural food. I love sweets, maybe the creature will too.
I not sure what happened, everything was eaten. I only closed my eyes for a second, I promise!
Craft Flour Sacks in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it
Get Pails of Water by fishing
I found a huge footprint! I need some materials to make cast of it.
Alastair thinks it could be a giant. This might be a new discovery! I named him Big Footy.
Craft Fried Fish in the Kitchen.
Craft Hard-Boiled Eggs in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it
I've named the giant, Big Footy, do you think it will want some eggs and fish? I like eggs and fish, I'm sure it will too.
Everything was gone again this morning. This Big Footy sure has an amazing appetite!
I still don't know what Big Footy could be. It sure eats anything I give it. Let's try 2 more things.
I finally found something Big Footy didn't like. None of the Noodles where eaten!
Click on water to catch fish
Could you use that fine fishing pole of yours to catch us some fish?
Mmm, what a scrumptious catch! Just like that Nathaniel...
Click on any water to catch fish.
If you aren’t in the mood for Fish, you can sell ‘em for some quick gold!
Selling items is a good way to get gold, for those who feel the need to EARN it.
Click on Houses to collect taxes.
With all these Houses, you could get heaps of gold by plundering - - er, collecting taxes.
You can plunder MY Bungalow anytime!
Click on Houses to collect taxes.
We could use some more houses, if you have the Wood and Stones for it!
Your fine Bungalow really swabs my deck!
Buy and build Houses from the market.
Click on the Great Hall to build Castle Towers
Building Houses is fun, but erecting Towers is my specialty!
Blow me down, that's the biggest Tower I've ever seen!
Click on the Great Hall to build Castle Towers.
Click on Castle Buildings to collect Gold
I could admire your Tower for hours, but I'd enjoy some gold even more.
That’s a quite a handful of booty you have there!
Click on Castle Buildings to collect Gold.
Click in the Gloom to Explore
Take that fine booty of yours and get exploring!
This is a great place to hide some loot. In fact... I DID hide some here, before the Gloom!
Click in the Gloom to Explore.
Click on natural objects to clear them
If you're going to find my loot, you'll need to clear the land!
Now you'll be able to find my loot, for certain!
Click on flowers and other natural objects to clear the land.
Have you seen my Chest? It’s large, curvy, and ripe for plundering!
Here, take my pirate flag. Now you’ll always be ready for a Jolly Rogering!
I love nature! Making the kingdom a greener place will help push away that nasty Gloom!
Ohh, thank you! Together we can make the kingdom vibrant and happy again!
Place Farm Plots to grow Crops
Click Fully grown Crops to Harvest
The poor bunnies out in the Gloom need our help! Let's grow some food for them.
Wow, those little guys were hungry!
Buy in the Animals tab of the Market
Place Farm Plots to grow Crops
Adding lots of animals will help bring new life to the kingdom. Chickens is a good start.
The fluffly little chicks are so cute!
Craft at a Kitchen or Trade with Friends
Should be use Feed on 1 Chicken
The chicks grow up fast and strong with the proper diet. Bird seed will hit the spot.
Buy in the Animals tab of the Market
Place Farm Plots to grow Crops
The kingdom could use some four-legged friends, too. How about some sheep?
Aww, they look like puffy little clouds!
Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market
Click Design Mode to move Objects
Some fences will help keep the Sheep from wandering off into danger.
Now the sheep have a safe place to graze.
Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market
Some new trees would add some cheer to the kingdom and give my bird friends a good home!
I love the sound of birdies in the morning!
Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends. Sell items from your Inventory.
All living things deserve protecting, even the beasties! We should stop hurting them!
This is the right thing to do, isn't it?
Let 5 Beasties live in your Kingdom
Perform activities in your Kingdom to attract Beasties
Even the beasties deserve a safe place to live away from the Gloom.
Oh my! The beasties are cute in their own way, I suppose.
Let 5 Beasties live in your Kingdom
Perform activities in your Kingdom to attract Beasties
Craft at a Kitchen or Trade with Friends
Click Design Mode to move Objects
Help! The beasties keep trying to eat the other animals. We need to feed them something!
Yikes! They nearly took my hand along with the treats! I hopes this keeps them busy.
Click on Beasties to Banish them
Oops! Alistaire explained to me that beasties are actually made of Gloom! They need to go!
I thought I was helping real animals, but they were part of the Gloom all along. My bad!
Click on Tom to gift him a sword
There is a cave that will help push back the GLOOM. Find Tom. He may have seen it.
That new Sword you gave to Tom is a mighty weapon! I'm sure he will help you.
Find Tom and help him prepare to fight the dragon.
I have a idea! I can catch it with some rope. This is a great idea don't you think?
I better have you show me how to tie a knot again. Big Footy broke free, very easily.
Build up your strength by moving things in your kingdom.
Click on a tree to chop it.
You need to toughen up a wee bit if you plan to be clearing caves.
That work has the inner fires burning. Moving Rocks is good practice for cave exploring.
Find Tom and help him prepare to fight the dragon.
Place the Great Hall from Your Inventory
Find 1 Trap in your Inventory and place it in the Kingdom.
The trap is finished! Just place where you want.
The perfect spot to catch Big Footy! I think we need more items to bait the trap properly.
Find the Crystal Cave in the Gloom
Click on the map area to explore the Crystal Cave
If my memory serves, I believe the cave was in this area.
There is a Dragon in that cave? By Nessie, I haven't seen one of them for many years.
Explore to find the Crystal Cave to see if there truly is a dragon.
Click on the Dragon to attack it
The first thing to learn about Dragons is that they are dangerous. But a straight attack looks like the only choice.
Well, that went poorly indeed. I suggest you try something else.
Attack the Dragon to drive it out of the Crystal Cave.
Fish to get Pails of Water
Click on the Dragon to dowse it with water
The second thing to learn about Dragons is that they breathe fire. You need to block that.
By heather, Pails of Water made no difference to that fire. We need a new tactic.
Fish to get Pails of Water.
Click on Chickens to acquire Eggs
Click on the Dragon to pelt it with eggs
EMBER: Oh please help me find my egg!
The third thing to know about Dragons is that they're proud. Throwing Eggs at her ought to bring her out.
Very strange, that is, if those Eggs have started the Dragon weeping?
I've heard if you kiss a frog it might become a prince! Could you help me find some frogs to kiss?
Yeeuck! All that kissing and all I have to show for it is the taste of flies in my mouth.
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends
Buy in the Animals tab of the Market
Sleeping damsels are awoke with a kiss from a handsome prince, right? I'll need a good sleeping aid.
(Yawwn) How long was I out? Hmm - still no prince, and now I have a splitting headache!
Find by Fishing or Collect from a Fishery
My mother was a siren. Maybe I can disguise myself as a mermaid and echant a prince with song.
Peew! It's hard to charm anyone when you smell like dead trout! I need to go take a bath.
Click on the Great Hall to buy Castle Buildings
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Who wouldn't rescue a damsel in distress? I'll lock myself up in a tower. And I'll need hair extensions.
No good. Have you ever tried to let someone climb your hair? It HURTS.
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Place Farm Plots to grow Crops
A king has offered his son's hand to any woman that can spin straw into gold! It's worth a try.
I think all I spun this straw into is a bad case of hay fever - achoo!
Buy in the Buildings tab of the Market
Buy in the Buildings tab of the Market
Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends
It's a bit weird, but I've heard a girl met a prince after living with several short miners. You buying this?
Let's never speak of this again.
Get 20 Cotton Cloth for a Gown
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
A neighboring kingdom is throwing a ball! I'll show up and ''accidentally'' leave behind a slipper.
Glass slippers certainly are not made for dancing!
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
It's risky, but running through the forest with treats attracts wolves. And maybe a brave rescuer?
A dozen wolf attacks and not a single rescue - chivalry is dead!
Find the Dragon Egg in the Gloom
Click on the map area to explore and find the Dragon Egg
The Dragon said her egg was taken east. I suggest you look here.
This might be where the egg was taken. Lots of guards here to keep people away.
Explore to search for the Dragon Egg.
Buy 1 Weapons Rack from the Market
Buy 1 Archery Target from the Market
What this kingdom needs is more powerful equipment!
That’s a great rack you have there!
This next step is my favorite. Forni – er, fortification!
Aye, that should help with our Beastie problem!
Craft Ropes at the Workshop or Trade with your Neighbors for it
Oak Tree Wood can be found in expansion areas. Craft Oak Planks at the WorkshopCraft Oak Planks at the Workshop or Trade with Neighbors
This will take a lot of materials, but it is time to build a trap that will hold Big Footy.
I'll need some time to finish this trap. Come back soon and see how it is going. I hope Big Footy won't be angry with me.
Click on Goblins to banish them
I'd wager these Thieves are hiding something you want.
Unpleasant, that lot was. Now search for the egg.
Banish the thieves that stole Ember's egg.
Buy 1 Watch Tower from the Market
A Watch Tower will give us some much-needed protection!
Fortification is more fun when we have the Town Watch!
Craft the Fried Fish in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it
Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Oat crops you need.
Get Berries from clearing grasses. Plant more from the Market, if you run out.
Let's bait this trap with all the creatures favorite foods!
All we can do now is wait for it come sniffing around around again. I can't wait to see it! I hope it is friendly!
Click on Ember to give her egg back.
EMBER: Oh thank you! But I'm stuck!
Where do you hide a Dragon egg, you ask? In Rock piles, says I.
Great piles of peat! That was a heavy egg! I hope there is still a wee Dragon inside.
Search for and return Ember's egg.
Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 6 Bubbling Grog
There's nothing like a mug of Grog after a long day of fortification.
I may've had a gouple Crogs too many!
Click the Trap to Free George
Click the Trap to cut George free
Help! My name is George I didn't mean any harm. I just couldn't resist the free goodies! Help get me free!
I love that little kld. He leaves me goodies! If it is your wish my lige, I'd love to live here.
Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Sticks of Butter.
Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Ropes.
Click on Ember to free her from the cave.
In her rush to come out for the egg the Dragon got wedged in. You need to get her out.
Butter is good on many things, but I never thought I would like it on a Dragon! Off she goes with her egg!
Gather butter and rope to help un-stick the Dragon.
Perform actions or explore to find Beasties
I could really go for a rousing round of Beastie beating!
Beastie beating is the perfect way to polish off the day!
Click on Thieves to banish them
It was a relief to see that Dragon fly off, your Majesty, but the cave is not yet yours.
The cave is yours now and fairly won. Somebody tried hard to keep you out of it. I wonder why.
Banish the thieves and claim your Crystal Cave.
Buy 1 Blacksmith from the Market and build it
Could you build me a Blacksmith? I've got a whole lot of sword polishing to do.
This looks like a great place to get hammered!
Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Candles.
Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Pickaxes.
Restore that cave and it will prove to a steady source of expansion crystals. Well done, your Majesty.
Excellent, your Majesty. Return to the cave each day to gather Crystals.
Collect candles and pickaxes to supply your Crystal Cave.
Chop Pine Trees to gather 5 Pine Logs
Mine Rocks to gather 5 Iron Ore
To get our new Blacksmith fired up, we'll need some Wood and Ore
Hard wood and dirty Ore? This is my kind of kingdom!
Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 2 Iron Bars
Let's put the Blacksmith to work banging out some Iron Bars!
These Iron Bars are just what I need to make Grog barrels!
What do you say we explore more of your bountiful lands?
Real task is Search the Chest
I've got more booty hidden around here somewhere. Can you give me a hand?
I was hoping for a porthole, but an anchor is good, too. Here you go!
Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Since there aren’t any good men around here, maybe I can transform a beast into a gentleman suitor.
Eeeek! Wolves do NOT like wearing pants!
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
I’m done with men for a while. I love to sing. Maybe with some new clothes I can start a singing career.
I love my new clothes. I’m inspired already!
Buy in the Animals tab of the Market
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
I need a new look for my next show. I’m thinking LOTS of color and red hair!
My fans will love all the colorful feathers!
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends.
I’ve got another act coming up and I want a look that’s a bit more dangerous.
The leather look is really popular with my fans.
Craft at a Workshop or Trade with Friends.
Thanks to you I’ve become a huge success! Some big jewels would show everyone how far I’ve come.
Oooh! I love the way they sparkle!
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
Place 3 Barrels to Store the fan Mail
Craft at a Studio or Trade with Friends.
I’ve finally found love – from all my fans! I have so much fan mail to respond to!
Fame has its hardships. I’m getting a terrible cramp in my wrist.
Buy 1 Armory from the Market and build it
Armories are full of Swords, Spears, and Clubs. What could be better?
I think I've found my new favorite place!
Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 5 Leather
Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 5 Iron Bars
Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 5 Steel Wool
You know what could be fun? Getting some Leather and Steel...
I'm sure I'll think of SOMETHING interesting to do with these...
Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 1 Steel Sword
My faithful cutlass isn't what it used to be. Could you get me a new Sword?
It's a bit shorter than the last one, but what matters is how you use it!
Craft, Trade, or ask a friend for 1 Practice Dummy
I'll need to get used to this new Sword. Can you get me a Practice Dummy?
You know what they say: practice makes perfect!
There's no one around to engage in swordplay with, so how about we beat some Beasties instead?
A few good thrusts always finishes them off!
Buy 1 Watch Tower from the Market
The Beasties are getting bolder. We could use another protective Tower.
The more protection the better, I always say!
Buy 1 Cottage from the Market and build it
You know I love Bungalows, but a Cottage would provide more gold!
Keep building houses, and soon you'll need your own Treasure Chest!
Click on 1 Cottage to collect taxes
Taxing sounds so boring. Go PILLAGE that Cottage!
Taxing, pillaging... it's all the same thing, really!
I'm feeling adventurous. Let's head out into the Gloom!
You never know what you'll find when you explore!
Real task is Search the Chest
The last of my loot is around her somewhere!
Ah, the figurehead! The best part of any ship!
Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom
Banish any Gloom Rats in the newly Explored Area
Banish any Gloom Wolves in the newly Explored Area
There are rumors that there is an area Gloomier than we've seen before. Follow the Slimy River to its source.
I was afraid the rumors were true. We have some work to do to spread happiness to the area.
Click Gloom Roots to clear them
Click Dead Trees to clear them
Tainted roots everywhere! We have found the long cursed Lamont Tree. We must stop its spreading corruption.
The taint has sunk deep into the soil. We must dig deeper to cleanse this place.
Select on a new area to Explore and disperse the Gloom
Banish any Gloom Wolves in the newly Explored Area
Banish any Goblins in the newly Explored Area
We need to see the source of this foul disease on the Land. Explore deeper into the Lamont Swamp.
So, this is the infamous Lamont Tree. It is as mighty as it is frightening. It still must be destroyed.
Buy and Place 1 Bridge over the Slimy River
Buy a bridge from the Market and place so you can path over the river to the great Lamont Tree
Click Gloom Roots to clear them
Getting close to Lamont is a must. Place a bridge cross over the Foul River to the island.
Now we can get a good look at this abomination! It is more alive than I would have guessed.
Craft Bubbly Grog at the Kitchen
Craft Dye Kits at the Studio or Trade with Neighbors for it
Clearing Grasses and Mushrooms will sometimes give you Toadstools
The external roots are gone, now let's take care of the main tap root! Bring me items to clean the water of it's gloom.
Pour the Cleansing Potion into the Slimy River
Click on the Slimy River around the Lamont Tree, the potion will do the rest
Take this potion and pour it into the Slimy River. It will do all the work!
Craft an Iron Axe at the Workshop
Craft Bags of Nails at the Workshop or Trade with Neighbors for it
Craft Horseshoes at the Workshop or Trade with Neighbors for it
Even in this weakened state, you'll need a special axe to chop down Lamont. I'll make you one if you get these ingredients.
Pour the Cleansing Potion into the Slimy River
Click on the Slimy River around the Lamont Tree, the potion will do the rest
This should peel back the rest of the bark. Throw this at Lamont. Just don't miss!
Chop Down the mighty Lamont Tree
Click the Lamont Tree to chop it
Take this Axe and take that wretched tree down!
Craft Tomato Bisque at the Kitchen
Craft Ink at the Studio or Trade with Neighbors for it
Retrieved from chopping at the Great Lamont Tree
The bark is the clue we needed! Gather more items for a potion that will strip the tree of its bark.
Craft Cakes at the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it
Faugrimm did something to my food that changed me. I'm so hungry. You won't poison me, will you?
Mmm, just like Mom's. My stomach hurts now.
Use the Magic Wand to Free the Boy
Click on the Slimy River around the Lamont Tree, the potion will do the rest
Take my trusty Magic Wand, it should be able to free the boy from his prison. Be careful though it has a kick.
Gain enough experience to be level 21
Hi there, an evil old man tricked me and I was turned into a tree so long ago! He promised to fix my house, will you?
The old man's name that did this to me was Faugrimm. I hate him! Can't talk now, gotta go play!
Buy a bridge from the Market and place so you can path over the river to the great Lamont Tree
Buy Dragon Horns from the Decoration Section of the Market
Dragons are really cool, don't you think? I wanna let everyone know they are real!
I did see a cool big red dragon near a cave. Let me know if you see it!
Aye, this is a respectable Castle with good prospects for growth. This kingdom may be to my liking.
Aye, I can help train knights for you, your Majesty.
This is a start, your Majesty. Give me the boys and I'll give you back the men.
Beastie Nearby! Do you want to clear this for {energy} energy?
Beastie Nearby! Do you want to feed for {energy_cost} energy?
Beastie Nearby! Do you want to chop this tree for {energy} energy?
Beastie Nearby! Do you want to chop this tree for {energy} energy?
Beastie Nearby! Do you want to clear this stump for {energy} energy?
Beastie Nearby! Do you want to mine for {energy} energy?
Your Majesty! Thank the stars you're here. A mysterious GLOOM is scaring away your SUBJECTS!
The GLOOM has spread throughout your land. Take a look for yourself!
You found SONJA's ARROWHEAD! She must be nearby...
You will need to find loyal SUBJECTS to help rebuild your KINGDOM and dispel the GLOOM.
A mighty strike! Those STARS give you EXPERIENCE (XP). Collect enough of those XP stars to LEVEL UP!
Huzzah! You have enough XP to LEVEL UP! When you LEVEL UP, you gain ENERGY to do more actions and unlock new items and abilities.
Oh no, not a GLOOM WOLF! Someone must save that poor girl!
Look at that LOOT! You should COLLECT those items. You might need them later.
Marvelous, your Highness! The GLOOM WOLF dropped one of SONJA'S ARROWHEADS. I wager she'd be HAPPY to have it back.
She tried to open the MAGICAL KEEP? No one has been able to do that since your father disappeared. Are you going to try?
You can also get more QUESTS from me. Look for the QUEST icon on the LEFT.
Royal coin purse a little light? Collecting taxes from HOUSES in your KINGDOM will get you some COINS!
That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! Oh, thank the stars, he must be nearby!
You opened the MAGIC KEEP!? You truly are the HERO we have been waiting for! You'll make a great RULER. I would like to join your KINGDOM and aid your ADVENTURE!
You will need a strong CASTLE to dispel the GLOOM. Let's build a GREAT HALL raise your CASTLE LEVEL and find ALASTAIR!
Richard, the jester, has gone missing. He entered the gloom in search of Sonja, and no one has seen him since. Can you find him?
QUESTS are special tasks people will give you from time to time. I'll give you one to start.
The list on the LEFT will display your current QUESTS. Click the ICONS to check a QUEST's requirements and your current progress.
This QUEST has two parts. First, let's collect some STONE from these rocks.
Now we can gather WOOD from a nearby TREE by clicking it.
Well played! You completed your first QUEST. Click the ICON for your reward.
That was fun right? Look for more quests from me and others. SONJA has one too.
SONJA has joined your KINGDOM and brought some HAPPINESS with her! HAPPIER KINGDOMS provide more rewards. Your HAPPINESS is shown on the lower LEFT.
Completing QUESTS for your SUBJECTS is another way to gain HAPPINESS and increase rewards. Exclamation marks mean that QUESTS are available.
Giving GIFTs to your KINGDOM's residents also increases HAPPINESS. Beloved Rulers check back frequently to keep their people HAPPY.
DECORATIONS make the people in your KINGDOM happy. More rewards for you! Huzzah!
Excellent work! Continue growing your KINGDOM by purchasing more land.

Zounds! I knew you could open your father's KEEP! Unfortunately, it looks like the KEEP is in need of REPAIR. I've just given you a QUEST to repair it. QUESTS are special tasks people will give you from time to time.
A magnificent Great Hall, your Majesty! Now you may name your KINGDOM!
Looks like you're running low on ENERGY. You have a few ITEMS in your INVENTORY that will restore ENERGY and allow you to continue building your KINGDOM.
Should you continue to run low on ENERGY, more ENERGY ITEMS may be purchased in the MARKET.
The more farm plots you have, the more CROPS your subjects can enjoy. Empty plots may be purchased from the BUILDING tab in the Market.
Crops planted near WATER grow faster because they're irrigated! Move your Empty FARM Plots near the POND and harvest some Wheat.
COINS let you buy items and buildings. That means HAPPY subjects and a growing KINGDOM. Collect TAXES from HOUSES to earn COINS.
Now you have enough COINS to start growing your KINGDOM!
Collect MATERIALS from this building and others like it to save ENERGY.
Your residents want GRAPES! You will need to PURCHASE an EMPTY FARM PLOT from the MARKET before you can get planting.
When you plant CROPS near WATER, they become irrigated and grow FASTER!
Huzzah! You've gained enough HAPPINESS to start building your CASTLE!
Now with your KEEP built, we can start to push back The GLOOM! But first you must collect enough COINS to EXPLORE.
Excellent, you have enough COINS. Let's EXPLORE!
That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! Oh, thank the stars, he must be nearby! Check the SATCHEL for clues.
Thank you for FREEING me! Can you also HELP me SEARCH for my lost ARROWHEAD? It's around here somewhere.
Upon my word, another GLOOM WOLF! Can you BANISH it?
Use COINS and EXPLORE here to see who this is.
Your game state is out of sync with the server. Please refresh the page to continue. Error: {error}
Some improvements were just made. Refresh the game to see the latest!
You have pending actions. Leave Game?
You do not have enough energy. Would you like to buy some?
Not enough coins. Would you like to buy more coins?
Not enough crowns. Would you like to buy more crowns?
Congratulations, you've unlocked some new items in the market! Would you like to see them?
Looks like you'll need a master blacksmith to break this rock. You should invite a friend.
You don't have any gifts. Click on accept to visit the gifts request page for more gifts.
Are you sure you want to sell all the items for {amount} {currency,object,count}?
string.variation: Are you sure you want to sell all the items for {amount} {currency,plural}?
Are you sure you want to sell all the items for {amount} {currency,singular}?

string.original: Don't ask me again while I sell these items.
Do you need more Coins or Cash?

Castle buildings need to be staffed. Recruit your friends to work in this building. The more times your crew visits, the higher the tax payout your receive. Friends that tend frequently boost your nobility rating.
This building is all about killing
Show all items ready to be made now
Craft your little heart out to hit level 50 and become a master!
You are currently at the happiness cap! Build more Castle parts to raise your cap.
Build more Castle Pieces to raise your Castle Level!
You'll be able to customize this avatar later.
UNCERTAIN TIMES CALL FOR GREAT RULERS TO LEAD THEIR PEOPLE TO HAPPINESS
Add this item to your wish list
Sort items by time to craft
Mouseover items for help finding them!
This item has already been by another player.
To Explore here, collect more Coins!
Would you like to Explore to this land for
You can not Explore here yet!
You can only Explore in adjacent areas.
The Great Hall must be built before Exploring here!
Click to see in the market!
Travel home and see this in the market!
You have {amount} in your inventory. Give one to {name}?
string.variation: You have {amount} in your inventory. Give one to {name,fem}?
You have {amount} in your inventory. Give one to {name,masc}?

string.original: Happiness provides a bonus to collection of COINS.
Increase your total Happiness Cap by Expanding!
Click to see who wants to give you a Message.
Pick a color to paint the primary color
Pick a color to paint the secondary color
Looks like a beastie has your kingdom locked down!
Until the offender is dealt with you will not be able to interact with your building, NPCs, animals, or crops near beastie.
You can't claim your own reward!
Sorry, looks like all the rewards have been claimed!
Sorry, you need to play Castleville before trying to claim this reward!
You got a reward! Play Castleville now!
Sorry! These feed rewards have all been collected.
Select the friends that you would like to send the {GIFT_NAME} gift
Here is a {GIFT_NAME} for you in Treasure Isle. Could you help me by sending a gift back?
Select the friends you would like to send the {gift_name} to!
If you don't see a friend in the list, it is because you already sent him/her a gift today
Select friends to send this gift to.
Select a FREE gift to send your friends!
Thank your friends for the gifts they sent you! Select a FREE gift to send them back!
Welcome {friendName} to Treasure Isle by sending a FREE gift...
Select a treasure to give away to your friends
Please remember to accept each gift right away.
Do you have more pending gifts to accept?
You have exceeded your limit of {limit} gifts. Be sure to use your existing gifts soon, or you can't accept more gifts!
The gift you tried to accept was LIMITED EDITION and is no longer available. More limited edition items coming soon!
Let you prepare beer and wine.
Adds new craftables at your magic shop.
Adds new craftables at your magic shop.
Unlocks new craftables at your magic Shop.
Unlocks new craftables at your magic Shop.
Helps you gather wood and cut your trees.
Unlocks new craftables at your magic Shop.
Where you can start a tax event.
Is it haunted? Expand here to find out!
Who could live here? Explore and find out!
I wonder if your wish will come true? Explore and find out!
This comes from harvesting Magic Beans.
This comes from a Cooking recipe.
This is a very rare drop.
If your game does not load within 10 seconds, you may need to upgrade your version of Flash. Please do so by clicking {link_start}here{link_end}
Here are your friends who don't have Castleville yet. Invite whomever you want -it's free!
There's a new version of the game. Let us refresh your browser.
Become a Fan to get extra coins and exclusive offers!
Become a dedicated Game Builder! You're just {number} clicks away!
At {requiredXP} experience you will reach level {nextLevel}.
Your max happiness will increase to {nextUpdateMaxHappiness} at level {nextUpdateLevel}!
Are you sure you want to sell this object?
Are you sure you want to sell "{item,object,singular}" for {amount} {currency,object,count}?
string.variation: Are you sure you want to sell "{item,singular}" for {amount} {currency,plural}?
Are you sure you want to sell "{item,singular}" for {amount} {currency,singular}?

string.original: Castleville fans get the latest updates, special gifts, and more!
...it's the best way to make sure you get the best treasures!
Select friends to add them as neighbors
Hello! Please be my neighbor in {appName}
Hello friend! Come be my neighbor in ExampleVille, where you can make a game and have fun!
Click here! Head on over to ExampleVille!
